title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?
speech: What is the index of the radical?
pacedSpeech: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is $$2$$, it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to $$0$$.
speech: Since the radical index is  2 , it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to  0, .

title: Solving the Radicand
speech: Solve , 3 x minus 1, is greater than or equal to 0 .
pacedSpeech: Solve  , 3 x minus 1, is greater than or equal to 0

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Add $$1$$ to both sides of the inequality and get $$3x$$ is greater than and equal to $$1$$.
speech: Add , 1  to both sides of the inequality and get  3 x  is greater than and equal to  1 .

is greater than and equal to   1

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Divide both sides of the inequality by $$3$$ and get $$x$$ is greater than and equal to $$\frac{1}{3}$$. We can turn it in to interval notation and get $$[\frac{1}{3},\infty)$$.
speech: Divide both sides of the inequality by  3  and get  x  is greater than and equal to  1 third . We can turn it in to interval notation and get , the closed open interval from 1 third to infinity .
